response.name: Barcelona & Madrid: A Spanish Adventure
response.description: Explore the vibrant cities of Barcelona and Madrid on this 10-day adventure. Discover the architectural wonders of Gaudi, indulge in delicious tapas, witness passionate flamenco performances, and immerse yourself in the rich culture and history of Spain. This trip offers a perfect blend of sightseeing, culinary delights, and cultural experiences.
